attributes.action: Re-instatement of Capital Punishment by referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To allow a referendum of the general electorate with an ultimate view to successfully re-instate Capital Punishment 
(Death Penalty)as an optional form of sentencing available to Trial Judges for murder cases so serious that no other option could be considered suitable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
